law.catch_line: Standards for performing lead-hazard detection or abatement procedures -- Compliance with administrative regulations.

text.section: No later than October 1, 1996, the department shall promulgate administrative regulations to establish the standards for performing lead-hazard detection or lead-hazard abatement procedures in target housing or child-occupied facilities, taking into account reliability, effectiveness, and safety.

Any activity involving lead-hazard detection or lead-hazard abatement procedures in target housing or child-occupied facilities shall comply with administrative regulations promulgated by the department and shall use certified personnel.

law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1996.
